org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ipm.FileInfo

  • public class FileInfo
extends Object
    Information about a file or directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(Path path)
        Default constructor that should be used in most cases. Will read the file at the path location and load the necessary file attributes.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file.

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(Path path,
                BasicFileAttributes fileAttributes,
                List<String> formats,
                Map<FileInfo.Algorithm,String> checksums)
        Constructor to use when loading existing file information.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the File info
        fileAttributes - The basic file attibutes of the file.
        formats - The list of formats
        checksums - The checksum map

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(URI location,
                String name)
        Constructor that creates an essentially empty FileInfo object. Only location and name will be set. Note: FileAttributes will not be created with this constructor and must be set manually.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the File system entity referenced by this FileInfo object.
        name - The name of the File System Entity referenced by this FileInfo object.

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(URI location,
                String name,
                FileTime creationTime,
                FileTime modifiedTime,
                boolean isFile,
                boolean isDirectory,
                long size,
                List<String> formats,
                Map<FileInfo.Algorithm,String> checksums)

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public URI getLocation()
        Returns:
        Location of file or directory.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(URI location)
        Parameters:
        location - the location of a file or directory.

      • getChecksum

        public String getChecksum(FileInfo.Algorithm algorithm)
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The algorithm of the checksum either MD5 or SHA1
        Returns:
        Checksum in known format of the file or null if directory.

      • addChecksum

        public void addChecksum(FileInfo.Algorithm algorithm,
                        String value)
        Add a checksum for this FileInfo object.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The algorithm of the FileInfo object.
        value - The value of checksum.

      • setChecksums

        Parameters:

      • getSize

        public long getSize()
        Returns:
        Size of the file or -1 if directory.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(long size)
        Sets the size of the File backing this FileInfo object.
        Parameters:
        size - The size in bytes of the file backing this FileInfo object.

      • isFile

        public boolean isFile()
        Returns:
        Whether or not a file is being described.

      • setIsFile

        public void setIsFile(boolean isFile)
        Sets whether or not the FileInfo describes a file on the file system.
        Parameters:
        isFile - True if the FileInfo object describes a file, false otherwise.

      • isDirectory

        public boolean isDirectory()
        Returns:
        Whether or not a directory is being described.

        Sets whether or not the FileInfo describes a directory on the file system.
        Parameters:
